chart_description: The HTTP Server Zone traffic chart shows the rate of bytes received and sent by the NGINX Plus HTTP load balancer from all client connections over a given time period. It is useful to monitor the amount of traffic to and from NGINX Plus to optimize performance and troubleshoot potential issues.

dimension_descriptions.received: The rate of bytes received by NGINX Plus from all client connections over a given time period. This metric is useful to monitor the volume of incoming traffic to NGINX Plus.
dimension_descriptions.sent: The rate of bytes sent by NGINX Plus to all client connections over a given time period. This metric is useful to monitor the volume of outgoing traffic from NGINX Plus.
